ViewObject.Name: CustMnjOntBomHeaderView
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
/* Formatted on 3/25/2019 10:25:23 AM (QP5 v5.256.13226.35510) */ SELECT CustMnjOntBomHeader.BOM_ID, CustMnjOntBomHeader.BOM_NUMBER, (SELECT LISTAGG (BPO_NO, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY BPO_NO) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT MnjBomBpoLinesAll.BPO_NO FROM MNJ_BOM_BPO_LINES_ALL MnjBomBpoLinesAll WHERE CustMnjOntBomHeader.BOM_ID = MnjBomBpoLinesAll.BOM_ID)) BPO_NO, (select sum(bpoL.ORDER_QTY) FROM MNJ_BOM_BPO_LINES_ALL bpoL where bpoL.BOM_ID= CustMnjOntBomHeader.BOM_ID )OrderQty, CustMnjOntBomHeader.BOM_DATE, CustMnjOntBomHeader.SALEORDER_ID, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ITEM_CODE, CustMnjOntBomHeader.BOM_STATUS, CustMnjOntBomHeader.REVISED_REMARKS, CustMnjOntBomHeader.RELEASE_DATE, CustMnjOntBomHeader.VERSION_NUMBER, CustMnjOntBomHeader.VERSION_DATE, CustMnjOntBomHeader.LINK_OAF_ID, CustMnjOntBomHeader.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE, CustMnjOntBomHeader.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, CustMnjOntBomHeader.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, CustMnjOntBomHeader.LAST_UPDATED_BY, CustMnjOntBomHeader.CREATION_DATE, CustMnjOntBomHeader.CREATED_BY, CustMnjOntBomHeader.HEADER_ID, CustMnjOntBomHeader.LINE_ID, CustMnjOntBomHeader.USER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION, CustMnjOntBomHeader.LEGACY_BOMID, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ORG_ID, CustMnjOntBomHeader.POST, CustMnjOntBomHeader.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE1, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE2, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE3, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE4, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE5, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE6, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE7, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE8, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE9, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE10, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE11, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE12, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE13, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE14, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE15, (SELECT ooha.ORDER_NUMBER FROM oe_order_headers_all ooha WHERE ooha.HEADER_ID = CustMnjOntBomHeader.Saleorder_Id) sale_order_number, (SELECT CU.CUSTOMER_NAME FROM AR_CUSTOMERS CU WHERE CU.CUSTOMER_ID = CustMnjOntBomHeader.Buyer_Id) buyer, (SELECT ooha.ORDER_NUMBER FROM oe_order_headers_all ooha WHERE ooha.HEADER_ID = CustMnjOntBomHeader.Saleorder_Id) sale_order_number2, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Buyer_Id, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Bpo_No_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Brand_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.End_User_Desc_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Fit_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Item_Desc_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Order_Qty_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Season_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Style_Name_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Style_No_c, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE16, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE17, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE18, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE19, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE20, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE21, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE22, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE23, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE24, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE25, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE26, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE27, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE28, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE29, CustMnjOntBomHeader.ATTRIBUTE30, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Error_Message, (SELECT name FROM hr_all_organization_units haou WHERE CustMnjOntBomHeader.Org_Id = haou.organization_id) unit_name, (SELECT name FROM hr_all_organization_units haou WHERE CustMnjOntBomHeader.Org_Id = haou.organization_id) shipment_unit, (SELECT COUNT (1) FROM MNJ_FILE_UPD_DWN ff WHERE ff.file_id = 'MB' || CustMnjOntBomHeader.Bom_Number) ATTACHEMNT, (SELECT SUM (ORDER_QTY) FROM MNJ_BOM_BPO_LINES_ALL MB WHERE MB.BOM_ID = CustMnjOntBomHeader.BOM_ID) TOT_ORD_QTY, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Order_Type, CustMnjOntBomHeader.Division, CustMnjOntBomHeader.STYLE_NAME_NEW, (SELECT DECODE (StyleLineEO.TRACK_BASIS, 'Style Name', StyleLineEO.STYLE_NAME, 'Style Number', StyleLineEO.STYLE_NUMBER) FROM PWC_MFG_BSS_STYLE_L StyleLineEO, pwc_mfg_bss_buyer_h pwcmfgbssbuyerh, PWC_MFG_BSS_SEASON_D SeasonDetailEO WHERE StyleLineEO.STYLE_IDENTIFIER = STYLE_NO_C AND pwcmfgbssbuyerh.BUYER_ID = BUYER_ID --AND pwcmfgbssbuyerh.ORG_ID = mmoda.final_mfg_org_id AND StyleLineEO.HEADER_ID = pwcmfgbssbuyerh.HEADER_ID AND SeasonDetailEO.LINE_ID = StyleLineEO.LINE_ID) CURRENT_STYLE_NO, (SELECT DECODE (StyleLineEO.TRACK_BASIS, 'Style Name', StyleLineEO.STYLE_NAME, 'Style Number', StyleLineEO.STYLE_NUMBER) FROM PWC_MFG_BSS_STYLE_L StyleLineEO, pwc_mfg_bss_buyer_h pwcmfgbssbuyerh, PWC_MFG_BSS_SEASON_D SeasonDetailEO WHERE StyleLineEO.STYLE_IDENTIFIER = STYLE_NAME_NEW AND pwcmfgbssbuyerh.BUYER_ID = BUYER_ID --AND pwcmfgbssbuyerh.ORG_ID = mmoda.final_mfg_org_id AND StyleLineEO.HEADER_ID = pwcmfgbssbuyerh.HEADER_ID AND SeasonDetailEO.LINE_ID = StyleLineEO.LINE_ID) CURRENT_STYLE_NAME FROM CUST_MNJ_ONT_BOM CustMnjOntBomHeader WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN CustMnjOntBomHeader.effective_start_date AND NVL (CustMnjOntBomHeader.effective_end_date, SYSDATE) AND CustMnjOntBomHeader.Buyer_Id IN (SELECT V.BUYER_ID FROM MNJ_USER_WISE_BUYERS_DET_V v WHERE V.USER_ID = NVL ( :p_userId, V.USER_ID))
ORDER BY CustMnjOntBomHeader.Bom_Number DESC
